commentBody: A very insightful story......and it comes down to this....what a choice....as an Independent leaning Republican with disdain for this man, at this point, when I stand in the voting booth in November  I have to vote "against" the other person I have equal disdain for. Why? If she wins the next nominee to SCOTUS would be further left than Obama's artful choice. Our nation cannot afford this. Sorry........
